message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I know will be incredibly valuable to your business.  I'm starting with a price of $1,000,000.  This reflects the significant value I believe it holds for you, while still leaving room for negotiation.  What do you think?

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I understand the value this product brings to your business. However,  $900,000 doesn't quite meet my expectations. I'm willing to come down to $950,000.  This reflects the substantial value I believe it holds for you while still being a fair price for me.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $950,000, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $920,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Bob, I understand your perspective. While I'm willing to be flexible,  $920,000 is still a bit low for me. How about we split the difference and settle on $935,000? This would be a fair compromise for both of us and allow us to move forward with this deal. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $930,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
